summary:
The Belgian Shepherd is a medium-sized herding dog from Belgium. There are four types, or varieties, based on their coat and color: Groenendael, Laekenois, Malinois, and Tervuren. These are sometimes considered separate breeds.

This dog has a long history of helping shepherds and is now a popular pet. It is also trained for many jobs, like police work, guarding, and search and rescue. They have been used by the military in many countries, including Belgium and the US.
title: Belgian Shepherd
